subject: Re: Ocean Underwriting Cloudflare DNS Management
preview: Good morning, Heath.  I'm sorry, but I had prior commitments last night. Would you be available to assist with the changes tonight? Otherwise, an evening next week?  Kind regards,  Cain    Cain Verlin

full_threads.body:
Good morning, Heath.

I'm sorry, but I had prior commitments last night. Would you be available to assist with the changes tonight? Otherwise, an evening next week?

Kind regards,

Cain



Cain Verlinden

Senior Cloud Consultant

T: +61272286314 | 1300 ATARIX

E: cain.verlinden@atarix.com.au

Suite 5.02, 8 Spring St, Sydney, NSW 2000 | http://atarix.com.au/





Atarix Confidential

Hi Cain,

Apologies for the late notice, I can do these changes tonight if that works for you?

Hi Heath,

That's not a problem either. I just thought we could avoid you or your team working outside business hours.

We require the following records created:

CNAME records:

Name: selector1._domainkey

Value: selector1-oceanunderwriting-com-au._domainkey.oceanunderwriting.onmicrosoft.com

TTL: 3600

Name: selector2._domainkey

Value: selector2-oceanunderwriting-com-au._domainkey.oceanunderwriting.onmicrosoft.com

TTL: 3600

TXT record:

Name: dmarc.microsoft.com.

Value: v=DMARC1; p=none; rua=mailto:dmarc@atarix.com.au; ruf=dmarc@atarix.com.au; fo=1

TTL: 3600

Which evening would suit your team to have the changes made?

Kind regards,

Cain



Cain Verlinden

Senior Cloud Consultant

T: +61272286314 | 1300 ATARIX

E: cain.verlinden@atarix.com.au

Suite 5.02, 8 Spring St, Sydney, NSW 2000 | http://atarix.com.au/





Atarix Confidential

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Heath Maguire

full_threads.body:
Good morning, Heath.

Thank you for your assistance last week with Ocean Underwriting's cutover.

We wish to create additional DNS records for email authentication and edit an existing record. Would it be possible to gain temporary access ourselves to apply the new records, as we'll need to configure them outside business hours and then test.

Kind regards,

Cain



Cain Verlinden

Senior Cloud Consultant

T: +61272286314 | 1300 ATARIX

E: cain.verlinden@atarix.com.au

Suite 5.02, 8 Spring St, Sydney, NSW 2000 | http://atarix.com.au/





Atarix Confidential

Awesome. Thanks Heath!



Cain Verlinden

Senior Cloud Consultant

T: +61272286314 | 1300 ATARIX

E: cain.verlinden@atarix.com.au

Suite 5.02, 8 Spring St, Sydney, NSW 2000 | http://atarix.com.au/





Atarix Confidential

Thanks Heath!

That's done the trick, although apologies, I jumped the gun on the TXT record being the only one we require tonight.

Would you mind helping us with three more?

MX Record

Host name: Value: Priority: TTL:

@ oceanunderwriting-com-au.mail.protection.outlook.com 0 3600

CNAME Record

Host name: Value: TTL:

autodiscover autodiscover.outlook.com 3600

TXT Record

Host name: Value: TTL:

@ v=spf1 include:spf.protection.outlook.com -all 3600

Following this, we'll need to add three more records, but they can wait until tomorrow.

Thanks again,

Cain



Cain Verlinden

Senior Cloud Consultant

T: +61272286314 | 1300 ATARIX

E: cain.verlinden@atarix.com.au

Suite 5.02, 8 Spring St, Sydney, NSW 2000 | http://atarix.com.au/





Atarix Confidential

Hi Heath,

Thank you so much for getting back to us so late in the evening.

We require a TXT record of the following:

TXT Name: @ (or blank if @ is not accepted)

TXT value: MS=ms50348161

TTL: 3600

That should do us for the evening. Tomorrow, I might need more of you assistance to add further records.

Many thanks,

Cain



Cain Verlinden

Senior Cloud Consultant

T: +61272286314 | 1300 ATARIX

E: cain.verlinden@atarix.com.au

Suite 5.02, 8 Spring St, Sydney, NSW 2000 | http://atarix.com.au/





Atarix Confidential

Hi Cain,

Yes sure, please send through the record and I will update.

Just adding support to this chain in case Heath is off-line.

Thanks
Liz


On Thu, 7 Sept 2023, 8:27 pm Cain Verlinden, <cain.verlinden@atarix.com.au> wrote:
Hi Heath,

I've been provided your details by Liz at Ocean Underwriting. We're hoping you have access to the Cloudflare account that currently manages Ocean Underwriting's domain.

We're currently in the process of moving Ocean Underwriting from their incumbent Microsoft 365 tenant to a new tenant, and we need to transfer the domain. To do this, we need to create a new TXT record.

Appreciate any help you might be able to offer.

If you prefer to call, I'm reachable all night on 02 7228 6314

PS. Liz won't be able to email from oceanunderwriting.com.au currently as the prior tenant is no longer associated with the domain.


Cain Verlinden
Senior Cloud Consultant
T: +61272286314 | 1300 ATARIX
E: cain.verlinden@atarix.com.au
Suite 5.02, 8 Spring St, Sydney, NSW 2000 | atarix.com.au



Atarix Confidential
